products.title: Elements Berry Blackout Blind For Velux  Windows
products.description: Take control of the temperature with this fiery elements berry blackout blind. Don't let the red hot colouring confuse you, this blind will also help to keep your room nice and cool in the summer as well as trapping the heat in the winter, offering you excellent insulation that take control of the temperature with this fiery elements berry blackout blind.

products.title: Skye Lava Red (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Meadow Flower Solar Redcurrant Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Meadow flower solar has a beautiful patterned fabric which really stand out, there are also different variations of fun colours. The flowers really make your home feel warm and comfortable. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric. Product id: db-pls0124 fabric colour: redcurrant material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Infusion Solar Raspberry Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar raspberry pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0024 fabric colour: raspberry headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1269 Classic Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1269 classic red - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Roller, 4159 Bright Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Semi-transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Classic Red (1269)
products.description: The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside. Softly diffuses incoming daylight. Elegant, decorative lighting effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Slim, elegant side rails and top case. Installs in minutes.

products.title: Venetian, 7060 Passionate Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows. Water and stain resistant - well suited for bathrooms and kitchens. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Venetian, 7060 passionate red - velux loft blind control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows.

products.title: Bright Red (4159)
products.description: A simple, stylish way to soften incoming light and achieve basic privacy. Diffuses sunlight provides privacy installs in minutes 15 different colours and designs buy made to measure bright red (4159) velux roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery.

products.title: Dark Red (4560) (Blackout)
products.description: The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day. Total blackout - best on the market. Oeko-tex certified. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window. Available in 24 colours. Installs in minutes. Buy made to measure dark red (4560) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds.

products.title: Raspberry (1051)
products.description: The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy. Blackout effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Improved insulation.
